# lcod://contract/core/string/trim@1.0.0

Trim whitespace from the start/end of a string.

## Notes

Remove leading and/or trailing ASCII whitespace.

## Input (`schema/trim.in.json`)
- `text` (string, required): text to trim.
- `mode` (string, optional): `both` (default), `start`, or `end`.

## Output (`schema/trim.out.json`)
- `value` (string): trimmed result.
